stages.title: The Happy Beginning
stages.content: Don't be afraid - monsters aren't real. Sometimes the things we imagine are scarier than what actually exists.

stages.title: Growing Concern
stages.content: Sometimes scary things help us grow. Facing our fears makes us stronger than we were before.

stages.title: The Monster Appears
stages.content: Being brave means facing your fears, even when they seem bigger than we are.

stages.title: Facing the Fear
stages.content: You're stronger than you think. Every step forward, no matter how small, is a victory.
